Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_acxbuxrp&referenceId=1_acxbuxrp&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: InvestmentPitch.com

Description: Ashton Addison speaks with Samuel Stebbins, CEO & Founder of Space Misfit, a Space theme first person shooter blockchain based game with GameFi functions. We discuss the growing community and growth of the game, the upcoming launch of the player driven marketplace, their two token ecosystem and the IDO for their token launch in January of 2022Twitter: https://twitter.com/SpaceMisfits&;#xD;
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3eejvkO
